content.detailedDescription: Went out with dog as my daughter got on her bus. bus pulled off. i looked up as usual. the was a silver craft with the sun reflecting off of it. no sound at all. it came from the east heading west. kind of wobbled a little, like from side to side. had a pale pinkish light underneath that was a continuous light. it was closer than they usually get. like maybe 200 feet above the tree. it looked to be about the size of a small car. it was oval shaped. the sun was really bouncing off making it shine like polished silver. i stepped in the door to grab my camera, like 2 seconds and it was gone when i got back out. they always go straight up and disappear soon as they get right above me. it feels like they are teasing me. i could not get a pic this time. it was different from the ones i usually see.
content.summary: Was more silver than white ran in to get camera and it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
It was viewed just along from oliver's castle on roundway hill, near devizes at around 10pm -10:30pm on saturday 26th july.

6 or so appeared to begin with, they were very bright, almost looked like burning balls of fire in the air, but concentrated. we dismissed chinese lanterns early on because they started moving in formation, with & against the wind & the brightness of them (from 3miles away) was so remarkable; they lit the ground beneath them. we were approximately 3 miles as i said from this event which was taking place directly opposite us at roughly 1000ft. above the horizon & just behind devizes city centre.  they made two pronounced formations, an orion's belt type thing followed by a triangle. the balls were intermittently turning off an on (as if there were on a switch, noticed the fade off & on of them), then reappearing (unless there were more) in different locations. i started the video after about 5 minutes of this & that would have been the video you saw. the energy that seem to hold all of us was remarkable. i was with 2 friends, one of which has served 5 years in the army. we are positive that due to the nature, movements, feeling we all had & sheer size & brightness of theses that they weren't at all normal or from earth. the film doesn't do the event much justice at all. we have another two video accounts also.

i will rack my brain for more info as i'm sure there is more that's escaped me, will also speak to my friends, but all our accounts at the time were exactly the same. it was happening, weren't drunk or on any drugs.

please get back to me.


bob.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Un-earth like feeling associated with these!

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos with my cell phone at the time and didn't realized what was captured, i just now found these photos again looking for another old picture from around the same time frame.  this picture was part of a small series of photo that was taken and kept private, nobody had access to this folder, can you examine this photo to make sure it was  not altered in any way?
content.summary: Entity appeared after the photo was taken

content.detailedDescription:
12:17 am oct 21st exactly --i was driving north bound between moores mill and west paces ferry rd on i-75. i was coming home from work.

there was a police man who pulled someone over,so a few cars were merging left to move over due to the police man out of his car giving someone  a ticket. i was very alert looking in all my mirrors, being diligent not to be caught off guard. what i am saying is my situational awareness was increased. a hundred feet after the police incident i saw an orange light that seemed to be growing in size the first few seconds i laid on eyes on it. it may have been hovering but i had a hard time getting perspective on the light the first one to two seconds. at three seconds i realized this object was not a light from a plane or any other known/similar object. i am former air force and without bragging, have seen every type of aircraft from most of my time at special operations fields or active squadrons. i know night cockpits from c-130s to light config on special rotor craft. my father was a naval aviator so i really have seen it all. 

but i was driving and i had gotten out ahead of the pack of  slowed cars. after seeing this gold glowing bright radiant object i immediately began to slow my car by tapping my breaks and moving over to the right hand lane. i saw the object almost underneath. it was a glowing bright object not perfectly round, but maybe in a elongated shape like a bullet, but it was not moving or possibly drifting. bright and shiny like a very bright star. as i approached the chattahochee river /i-285 it was driectly above. i had slowed to 40 mph and had my head stuffed over my dash. as i was almost directly under it, the object seemed to vanish into or behind something. it just moved in a short line leaving a glow streak and then it seemed to dissappeared. this gave the impression that it traveled a short distance and just went inside another invisble object or who knows....????

i continued to drive on thinking "did it just dissappear?" i almost swereved into the exit, at cumberland parkway but at that speed i may have crashed. i just drove on thinking about all the details so i could make this report. this was not a helicopter, plane, or satelite. it could have been the iss (?) i have seen that before and it looked the same orange color... the brightness could have been due to clear night air. this reporet is an fyi so maybe someone else saw it.
content.summary: Driving north on i-75 saw bright gold/orange object that moved away very quickly

content.detailedDescription: I work overnight security watching residential buildings. during one of my patrols at around 2240-2250, a dimly lit moving object in the sky caught my attention, upon closer inspection i noticed that the light was actually a cluster of lights (at least a dozen) attached to what seemed like a boomerang. it's important i note that i never saw the boomerang itself, i am only assuming that because the lights seemed to be attached because they were moving in a perfect synchronization. i can guarantee that was no man-made plane. the simplest example i can give is, if you were to see the cluster of orion's belt moving while other stars remained stationary. i reported it to the police has one coof laughed at my face and the other tried to find reasons to disprove it. this is my first ever experience witnessing something like that in person. i have always been a skeptic towards sighting and usually doubted whether people actually miss understood an object for something that it wasn't. but i know for a fact it was definitely not a plane.
content.summary: A huge boomerang shaped object with still lights

content.detailedDescription: Was on my private hotel balcony on vacation at ocean city maryland when i seen the 3 objects heading from the horizon south east out over the atlantic ocean heading north ward up to about a 45 degree angle. first there were 2 objects one following the other these same two vanished or disappeared but did so slowly and did not vanish instantly.. about 4 minutes later the third object followed the same flight path and did the exact same thing and vanished. all three were orangeish in color. all three you could say were like orbs i guess or glowing type balls.. i also happened to have my binoculars which i always take to the shore. they did not help me to identify these objects but only confused/irritated me all the more when i could not make them out. the speed they traveled was not fast but consistent and ever so slightly upwards. i have yet to hear much if anything about this sighting. i'm sure there were thousands of people that night at that time on the boardwalk! no noise was heard as if they were jets of some sort.. besides that afterburners would of made quite a bit of noise. no helicopter rotor blades were heard either.. no noise.. nothing.. however boardwalk noises could of masked this but i sort of doubt it.. i spent 8 years in the united states air force and i know my aircraft. unless it was the maryland national guard or an active duty component of the air force or navy, or even coast guard i have no idea what they were.. but i am not one for making anything up. i have also seen that others have seen similar objects some of which are on you tube. all i can say is that it left me feeling a little bewildered and wondering.. aircraft do not glow on their sides like this, nor are their exterior lightings like this either.. or i have at least not seen this type before. i am also an amateur astronomer. so you can rule out anything celestial. no planet or star like stuff, meteor's etc.. oh.. and no chinese lantern stuff either.. these objects were way to big and way to far out over the ocean and traveling way to fast for a lantern or any type of fireworks etc from a boat.. thanks
content.summary: Three object out over the ocean at ocean city maryland august 8 2014

content.detailedDescription: In mid august i stepped out for a cigarette around 12:00 a.M., i was just north of a ski resort in wexford county by about a mile. i am usually looking in the sky at night so seeing what i saw was no problem. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter but it couldn't have been. as i stepped into the middle of the driveway and lit up my cigarette, i started star gazing and looked casually to my left which is east, i witnessed a glowing orb moving across the ridge/horizon i am facing from east to west, blinking on random times not like a plane or copter. and it scooted then hovered scooted then hovered and when it was directly above the ski resort it actually moved as if it was following a ski run in the air. it looked like if a star randomly smoothly zig zagged across the southern ridge. at this point my mind is opening to new outlooks and possibilities while this is happening.So the ufo stopped above the ridge, it held a position about 350+ feet up, and disappeared.
content.summary: A glowing/blinking ball of light floated very strange like a leaf in the breeze.

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog outside at 10:15pm on october 16, 2014. i always look up in the sky to look at the stars. all of a sudden there were these yellow-orange lights, like an open triangle/boomerang (maybe 50 degree angle) flying above me, coming from ne going sw. the lights (which formed the open triangle shape) maybe 10 per side, looked so different nothing like i had ever seen before. it had a bright light in the center and a ring light around it. what struck me was it made no sound at all, absolutely silent. i tried to see a shape (besides the one the lights made) but i couldn't. the whole event lasted maybe 10 seconds because the object was flying above me from ne to sw and i lost sight of it due to houses and trees. i thought maybe that was a hang glider but then i thought they don't fly at night and those lights looked so different.
content.summary: Saw one flying object which looked like an open triangle/boomerang shape yellow/orange lights (maybe 10 per side) fly above me on 10/10/14 at 10:15pm. lights had bright light in the center and a ring light around it.

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:45 pm on october 8th 2014 me and my mother were driving down northern avenue and noticed an orangish glowing orb that was slowly hovering above albertsons, we then stopped to try to take a picture but by the time we stopped it dissapeared. as we drove further down the street i noticed another glowing orb that looked identical hovering over a cemetary , then we immediately pulled into the parking lot of walgreens and i was able to take multiple pictures and a short video while it slowly ascended into the sky and eventually dissapeared after a few minutes.
content.summary: A orangish pulsating orb that was hovering then ascended and dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette and i usually like to look at the stars every night. well i was looking and suddenly this bright yellow/orange spherical orb caught my eye. i knew it wasnt a star because it was moving (from my perspective) from east to west. i also knew it wasn't any kind of aircraft because of how fast it was moving. well anyways i continued to watch it when suddenly it changed course and headed away and rapidly ascended away until i couldn't see it anymore. it was extremely interesting to say the least.
content.summary: I was standing outside smoking and i observed a bright yellow sphere going east to west.

content.detailedDescription: At the beach with friends watching sunset then observed the light for about 30 min. it went for the south to the north then west until it disappeared. never more than 3 ft. off the top of the water. asking friends if they took a pics. non so far
content.summary: 3 ft. over water going south to north then west

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our way home one night and we noticed an extremely bright and low light above the tree tops adjacent to the street we were presently on. being so close we were nosy thinking it was police and decided to rubberneck. the closer we got we realized it was hovering stationary and without any detectable sound being emitted. there was a very large and very bright central light much brighter than a typical search light. we detected a triangular shape while approaching the craft by a street perpendicular to the one it appeared to be above. as we got closer it made an abrupt sideways movement to the east, but it did not make a turn it seemed to just move to the side at a significant amount of speed. we were already extremely intrigued and attempted to follow it. it was very hard to keep up with but we were able to maintain sight of the light being emitted. it had moved roughly 2 or so miles to the east and appeared to be hovering stationary again but this time over a field near some railroad tracks. it again starting moving abruptly and with great speed toward the direction of the regional airport. because of its speed and the way the roads are laid out we were unable to keep up with it.
content.summary: Triangular with very bright central light hovering over tree tops with and abrupt and unnatural movement to the east

content.detailedDescription:
After looking through my telescope at the moon for some time, i started noticing a strange dark object flying in front of the moon. the moon was now at least 30 degrees in the sky. i had the moon zoomed in, i;m not sure how many times. (i think it was 45 times, with nearly full moon filling up most of the view through the eyepiece. although i couldn't tell the object's exact elevation, i had a "sense", or i perceived the object to be at an elevation considerably higher than that of civil aircraft. the object looked to move at about the same speed as a jet would look like through the telescope. with this in mind, i theorized that the object would need to be moving at a speed of at least about 600 mph, perhaps at thousands of miles per hour. as i tracked the object with my telescope, i watched the object pass in front of the side of the moon that was not sunlit. i could still see the object because it was darker than the surrounding sky. (although the sky was cloudless, it still glowed due to light from the moon or lights, etc.) it's shape was bizarre, unlike any craft that i know of. it's edges looked straight. it didn't look symmetric. it looked like a jumbled up pile of random shapes randomly thrown on each other in no particular order. i think it may have had curved edges on it as well, but i'm not sure. the shape didn't change, spin, rotate, etc. i observed the object until it passed in front of the "edge" of the moon. as it seemed to pass in front of the "edge" of the moon, i tried keeping track of it but i lost it for approximately half a second. it seemed to change color so quickly that i wasn't able to notice, making itself the same color as the sky. in other words, it seemed to "disappear". i didn't see it change color but i concluded that something like this happened because i couldn't see it anymore. i think there was a pause of less than a second after it "disappeared", but i couldn't quite tell because all of this was happening quickly for me. although the object was invisible, i kept track, as though the object was till moving on its flight path, to see if the object might reappear. then i observed something in place of the object! sparks appearing, glimmering, and disappearing! it was incredible how far away looked! it was like watching a massive explosion from tens of miles away!
i didn't get my camera because i was afraid i wasn't going to get back on time to record the object, but that would have been an incredible view if i were to record it! after the object was gone, i kept observing the moon. five minutes later, i observe the same event! this time i observed the object more closely. sure enough, it looked like an object in orbit. this object flew in front of the "edge" of the moon, and did the same thing. i may have increase the magnification of the telescope at this time, but anyways i was able to have a more detailed look. as i looked closer at the object, i noticed it's dull, nonreflective, and solid. as i looked more carefully at what exactly was happening to the object as it "disappeared", i noticed the sparks were actually burning debris being ejected from the object, and flying in patterns, in what i would call "streams". it was similar to how certain kinds of fireworks shells look like when they explode, or when a rocket or space vehicle disintegrates. i did not see any projectiles coming towards any of the objects to blow them down. the color of the sparks was mostly bright white, and i think there were some sparks with hues of yellow/orange/red in them. i don't remember any more details at the moment, but if i do, i will send them in. overall, i don't remeber much about the sighting because i was in such suspense. i would describe it as a mysterious experience and after the sighting i was still mesmerized about how i felt during the sighting.  in other words, i was part of something mysterious that was happening, and i'm experiencing it myself, and i wondered, was there anyone else who observed the same thing? i am now inspired to keep observing the night sky because i know there are mysterious things to be seen that happen in the night sky, you just have to keep observing. i wish i could dedicate the rest of my life to observing the night sky every night and i hope to see more of these objects!
content.summary: Two bizarrely shaped dark objects with flying in front of moon, second one five minutes after the first, both seemed to

content.detailedDescription:
See video, i have seen this 2 times now in 2 years with video and pictures. being completely off guard with this . i tried to post. the next day everything was erased other than up loaded video of this event. my neighbor and son also saw this as i intended to use there telescope to get a closer look. the next day everything was erased from my computers???? so i have not done until now i post. i tried that night but was unable to. following i have noise bleeding for the next year and felt very uncomfortable in my home.Today it was posted as many have had disbelief as my son sent me pictures and news of a football field object seen in mamet,wv    

i have seen this also in many areas of the glob, not just here and most look the same help!
content.summary: Ufo marmet ,wv 2013 seen 2 times now have pictures and video!

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back stoop having a cigarette. i saw a jet and was watching it. the jet was flying east to west. out of the corner of my eye, i saw something. i looked at it thinking it was a shooting star, but it was green and left an appearent trail that lingered as a jet trail would. it had a north to south direction. it appeared, from my point of view, to be going straight toward the jet. i was immediately concerned about an impact with the jet. it, however, passed overhead of the jet. i lost sight of it when it went over the clouds. i went on the internet to look up shooting stars. the only reference to the green that i found was in the trail but not the meteor.
content.summary: Green light leaving a white trail

content.detailedDescription:
I notice a large number of con-trails that afternoon.  i went outside and took two images of the sky which included the sun.  i had no idea there was anything different on one of the images.  i am familar of lense flair and this could be be doesn't appear to be.  the other shot shows no such flair.  i only noticed the spot when i went back inside and looked at the images on the camera viewfinder.  the area was on the first image taken at 6:14 and not on the second image taken at 6:18.  the time between the images was just short of 5 minutes.  after i took the first image i went inside and pulled it up on the viewfinder then went back outside and took the second and that is why there is almost 5 minutes between them.  i am sure there must be a good reason for this but it just looks different or possibly real and this is the first time i have sent one of my pictures in for a second look.
  i didn't see the object so i can't answer some of the questions although it requires me to check a box
content.summary: It was captured on a digital image

content.detailedDescription: Driving just south of koosharem utah, at about 12:15 in the morning on friday oct. 17th. noticed a flashing light out in the field or sage brush. though to myself the light must be further than i had judged because i did not get to it and pass it quickly. then i asked my daughter, is it just me or is that light moving. she said yes it looks like it is. i sped up to about 70 mph and slowly gained on the light. it was about 60 yards off the highway, maybe 5' in the air. i thought maybe it was a four wheeler with a blinking light, but then decided a four wheeler could not go 65 mph. about that time we passed an old house and barn yard just off the highway and the light passed through the yard. i knew there was not a road through the yard. we started to discuss what the light could be and it slowly feel behind me. my daughter wanted me to turn around and shine my lights on it, so instead, i just stopped and turned my truck pointing out into the sage brush so we could see what it was when it passed by. it stopped about 100 yards back. i being impatient and wanting to get to our destination said let's go. it started to move when i started to move, but we left it behind. my daughter kept trying to get me to turn around, but i didn't and now i wish i would have. no idea what it was. when we came back through the area during the day on the 18th, the light would have traveled through fields and sage brush with fences so it couldn't have been on a wheeled vehicle, and the distance we could see it was probably about 2 miles long, so i don't think it could have been a remote control unit unless it was quite sophisticated. anyway, kind of fun, but i can't explain it.
content.summary: Light 50 to 60 yards off highway traveling about 65 mph flashing about every 3 secs thru fields with fences, about 5' in the air. when i stopped it stopped.  when i started to go again, it started to go, and i just left it behind. daughter with me.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my front porch looking e. when i noticed a 'mars' colored object hovering at a point ne of me approx. 35Â° ne of true north.  the red-orange object was stationary with a dark gray cloud bank behind it and a light gray fog bank about a mile away from me between the object and myself.  i watched it for about 15-20 seconds before it descended.  it took about 3-4 seconds to go in a straight line down behind the fog bank.  i have not seen any object do this before.  it left no trace or trail behind it and was not seen again.  ned
content.summary: Red-orange round object was stationary until it descended.

content.detailedDescription: This morning, blue sky, few clouds,i was driving over to my brothers apt. i was stopped at red light and happened to look up, and saw what i thought was a commercial plane reflecting the sunlight. then i could see it was not a plane. it was a cylinder shape and above the treeline. the light changed and  the trees blocked my area of sight. i expected to see the ufo emerge  over the school rooftop and from the trees, nothing was there! yesterday.,before a storm i tried to open mind and  heart and ask to have a sighting. i didn't see anything in the area i was looking because storm coming. this morning, the ufo was in the sky, exact area i was trying to summon the day before. i felt this sighting was meant for me to see. i felt amazed and grateful.Also referring to my case 59596, the silver triangle was not in the town of catalina,az. it was on the pinal parkway, between the city of catalina and coolidge, az. and closer to the tom mix memorial. keep looking up.....I am!
content.summary: Saw what i thought was plane

content.detailedDescription: I had my grandchildren staying the night and they were sleeping in my bed. i woke up for work about 7am and saw to the left side of my granddaughter a round ball that had tentacle hanging from it. at the bottom of the tentacles was little lights. that pulsated up the tentacle. i watched it for about ten seconds and then is just evaporated. i am not crazy and i was fully awake. i really do not know what i saw. i just move into this old farm house a couple of weeks ago.
content.summary: I woke up at 7am in the morning to a ball that had tentacle hanging from it with little lights on the bottom of tentacles

content.detailedDescription: Saw a cloud casting a shadow from the sun.  thought it would be a good picture.  noticed a bronze white sphere descending.  took 3 consecutive pics before gone.  when i went to view the pictures on a larger screen i saw the object.  i verified it was not a lens flair as it moved in a straight line down.  i am attaching the pictures.  i can say i had a strong urge to take the pictures before i stopped to take them.  almost like i was told to take the picture.  weird.
content.summary: Saw a cloud casting a shadow from the sun.  thought it would be a good picture.  noticed a bronze white sphere desending.  took 3 consecutive pics before gone.

content.detailedDescription: If you want to see a lot of ufo's, on a clear night, we have seen several different ones in hobbs nm. in our news-sun newspaper, it was front page articles. we have considered them "friends". we have taken our flashlight  out to shine up. we have seen triangles, squares, and cylinders. the orb is a round light. they see it and respond to it with another flash.`we
content.summary: Just to mine of them. that is u.F.O.S

content.detailedDescription: I was walking dogs and saw a boomerang shaped object that changed colors from deep blue to deep purple. i immediately pulled out my iphone and started filming. the object went below the tree line and i did not pursue.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Colors changed from deep blue to purple

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo in antioch ca at 5:15pm on 10/19/20014 i went out front to talk to a friend that was walking by with her daughter she was on her bike i saw them walking by my brother mother and i went out to talk to her and i was talking to her about 15 minutes i was facing south and out of no where i saw from the corner of my eye a object hovering over putnam it was maybe 50 feet over treetop level it was south east from where i was standing my mother brother friend and her daughter seen it we all thought it was a balloon at first so i ran in got my camera and my phone it has a cameras i went to take a pic but my camera batt died it was fully charged that day then tried to take a pic with my phone it died the same way it was fully charged so my brother ran it and got high powered binoculars and i seen it it wasnt a balloon it was egg shape on top and it was like pearl white and it looked like it had octopus tenticals they were a orange red color it was wobbling like if it was nailed in the top to a board the thing could wobble its hard to explain but i saw the tenticals open out wide then go back to the position they were in they were set like landing gear there were 5 or 6 titntical looking legs it was windy and the thing just sat there wobbling then a little before it took off 2 lights came on the egg shape part had a white light and glowed and the bottom had a amber light in the middle it took off toward the north east real slow and was climbing higher and higher but going slow still wobbling and it went so high till we couldnt see it anymore it lasted about 15 minutes we have good high powered binoculars so i saw it clear if it was a balloon it would not been able to stay in one spot and just wobble with it being windy and my phone and camera batts wouldnt have been drained when i had charged them that day i could right more but my arthritis is killing me sitting at the computer i can tell someone better over the phone i cant find the right words that wont make me sound crazy but 5 of us saw it
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen a ufo in antioch ca. on oct.19,2014 at 5:15pm it lasted about 15 min

content.detailedDescription: Couldn't sleep, looked out bedroom window hoping to maybe see some deer, when off to my right towards lower woods pond, this craft appears right over trees  towards me. craft was bathed in lights moving very slowly, i first thought a helicopter, then i realized it was silent, no sound whatsoever! not only that it was huge, maybe twice the size of a b2 bomber! i couldn't believe the size and shape, even the lights were huge. again, went by me at very low speed, just above trees, and turned around when it hit the road (rte. 371) which is about 1/4 mile from my cabin. went by me exact same speed and direction from when it came. it was like the movie from clos encounters. i saw later in year ufo hunters show, a guy interviewed from bucks county described exact same craft he saw. he had same reaction and description as me. lower woods pond is approx 20 miles north of honesdale, pa. we have a hunting/fishing cabin.
content.summary: Passed by me at 5mph just above trees, turned back exact way.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my garage.  my grand daughter came in the garage to tell me she found one of her walkie talkies we hade lost about a month before. she only found one. i turned it on and it still worked. she began babbling into it for a few minutes and then someone answered her babbling also. i thought someone was messing with her. so i just played along. she asked me who was that. jokingly i said it was the aliens. she said which ones. i said the ones that fly around in the sky. she said she wanted to see one. i told her she probably wouldn't see one. they are hard to see. she insisted we go out to the circle drive we live on. she kept asking what is that. its just an airplane i said. we saw several planes over the next few minutes.  then we both got quite.  i saw 3 slits of light in the distance.  then it was 4 lights then 5 then 6. i could tell they were headed our way. i was eager to identity what they were. they all slowed together as they flew over our heads. the craft was invisible until it got right over our heads. my grand daughter took off running and told me to get in the garage. i said its ok and to wait a minute.  she stopped a witnessed it with me. the silhouette of the craft appeared. it looked black. then i realized it was two separate craft with light on each end of the blades. a small bolt of light crawled down the lead vehicles blade. i could then see it was a beautiful dark blue purlple metallic with a green metallic stripe down the middle of the blade. the light went out and they both took off faster than anything i've ever seen. my grand daughter was adamant about getting inside. she was visibly shaken. i was in shock a little. i don't think i would have believed what i saw if she hadn't seen too. she wouldn't talk on her walkie talkie anymore.  she thinks she called them. i can't say i disagree.  very strange i know. coolest thing i've ever seen in my life.
content.summary: 3 bladed fan

content.detailedDescription: First noticed these in the sky around the lunar eclipse. after having noticed them, i began looking for them and realized that became easier to find. after finding them, i began to study the objects, to find that they were appearing closer. one or more objects were moving. on october 20, one appeared very close and began moving across the sky.
content.summary: Observed multiple cylindrical object. one appeared closer and moved across the sky

content.detailedDescription: He was in the barn was a 3 day event and have other pics but want to speek to someone from mufon to explain the story more in detail since way to much to write sorry.
content.summary: Was in the barn

content.detailedDescription: First let me start by saying thanks to you guys for letting me share my experience. well i was on my way to work normal day a bit cloudy i took the exit 98 of parkway south and right after i paid the toll i noticed something in the sky weird shape dark gray color look like something out of a movie i called my wife and tell her about i was trying to stop but is no shoulder and once i took the  ramp i lost sight of the thing i got very nervous and confused thinking over and over if wherever i just saw was real and finally today i saw your show reverse engineering and saw the pictures of the thing in california that the guy named isaac claims to know about it i didn't see any symbols but was dark gray no noise no lights was just there like it was looking at something.
content.summary: I was on my way to work normal day a bit cloudy when something got my attention in the sky i never seen before
content.locationName: Wall township new jersey , New Jersey

content.detailedDescription: I don't know how to photograph this, and i don't care who believes me anymore.  i've kept these sightings to myself since spring of this year when they began, because no matter what i say, people think i'm hallucinating it.  this is not my imagination and i surely cannot be the only person to keep seeing these.  each sighting is similar, but different.  it always occurs between about 10:00 pm to midnight.  i look up every night with every cigarette break and i have nothing to gain here by telling this, other than some comfort that someone else must be seeing these, i am not crazy, and, i know exactly what these are.  at first, it really seems like a stationary, bright star, that suddenly moves.  i tell myself, it's a satellite or a shooting star, and watch it intently, only for it to defy all logic as the star, moves at speeds that seem impossible.  it moves slow at times, then very very fast.  they often slow down and speed up and stop.  they often switch directions sharply and too quickly to be human.  i have also noticed a second one not far from the first on at least 3 occasions.  the fireflies as i call them now, seem to sometimes do a light dance with each other...I cannot explain it.  they blink at times, resembling morse code.  sometimes, they disappear into thin air and reappear a few seconds later.  i followed one that stopped, dimmed, and sort of resumed looking like just a star, only to go brighter than anything i have ever seen, the brightest of the brightest stars, then fling itself further into the northern horizon.  when i see them, and watch, it's almost like they are trying to look like stars, and trying to hide their movements if that makes any sense.  when i first witnessed these, i thought i was going to have a heart attack.  i have never felt that type of fear except for a dream.  my jaw opened and i couldn't close it.  i couldn't move.  i couldn't breathe. i couldn't focus and i just cried.  that was earlier this summer and i have seen them multiple times since and while i am awe struck every single time, the truth is, nobody can tell me i'm not seeing what i know i am seeing and i don't care if people think i'm crazy because if people just watch long enough, they will see it too.  and, given that these things are being seen so often, i know i will continue to see them, and i will point them out to others when i can, but surely, somebody, can study the skies here and see them and document them.  they are real, they are amazing, and whether you decide to investigate or not, i know, without any doubt, these are not from earth.  once others actually see them, the sheer movements they make will say to anyone, that isn't possible.  whatever that is, it defies physics, and is not a human creation.  i feel a bit scared to be honest.  why are they there?  why hasn't the government been truthful and why are these and other sightings increasing? what is going to happen to us???  i have such an overwhelming sense of fear.  and, anyone that sees these, i know they will too.  you cannot see these things and how they move without getting scared.  surely someone else is seeing them!  that's all i have to say.  i debated doing this all summer until i realized, i have a duty to tell somebody. even if i am not believed, i want my report in the books, because it is real, and i'll go to my grave adamant and completely and utterly convinced that i know what i'm witnessing.  there are no more doubts here.  thank you.  please, have someone watch.  i've no doubts you'll see them.
content.summary: 5th sighting, more than 1, defies all logic
